Name: Mono Playground
About the game: Welcome to Mono Playground! This game is a basic 2D platformer adventure, where you can run up walls, eat cookies, and earn a high score! You play as Mono Kitty, an intrepid adventure in search of something to nourish his cravings of adventure, and stomach! Hope y'all enjoy the experience.
